title: [WAAAF passing out parade at Somers, Victoria]

abstract: Footage of Women's Auxilary Australian Air Force (WAAAF) passing out parade at the start of World War II.
description: Amateur filmmaker's coverage of Women's Auxilary Australian Air Force (WAAAF) passing out parade at Somers, (Mornington Peninsula,) Victoria, at the beginning of World War II. The colour film shows the unit parading for Wing Commander N. Mulroney, Commanding Officer (RAAF); his inspection, the Commander chatting with WAAAF members and the group being photographed by a Herald Newspaper photographer. Rare footage of WAAAF members in training at Somers beach is also included.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002446; Australian War Memorial; Active; 2011
